data.title: Pentair equipment designed for the pool of the future
data.meta_description: Pentair will be unveiling its exclusive new releases and innovations, alongside its numerous product ranges, at a stand covering almost 280 m². Guided for the past several years by the concept of the «smart and sustainable pool», the company is taking on a changing pool market y
data.text:
Pentair unveiled its exclusive new releases and innovations, alongside its numerous product ranges, at a stand covering almost 280 m².

High-performance, smart and sustainable solutions of Pentair

Guided for the past several years by the concept of the «smart and sustainable pool», the company is taking on a changing pool market yet remains perfectly at ease with new consumer expectations. Indeed, in recent years the new variable-speed pumps, cartridge filters and heat pumps released by one of the market's leading suppliers of pool equipment and products have already been geared towards the pool of the future, equipped with more eco-responsible, sustainable and water/energy-efficient products.

At this year's convention, Pentair exhibited new upgrades to its solutions to make them more high-performance, smarter and more sustainable, as well as a selection of variable-speed pumps, filters, smart automation systems, cleaning robots, heat pumps, and more. Among these are the brand new heat pump with unique Pentair Intellitemp technology, alongside the PAC Pentair InverTemp-FL, an extremely low-noise Full Inverter that optimises consumption via its compressor-inverter and variable-speed fan.

Smart and sustainable pools on the Pentair stand at Piscine Global Europe

Solutions that are more autonomous, eco-responsible and smarter, using just the right amount of energy and products, and in some cases reducing these amounts significantly.

Connected solutions to improve everyday ease of use for professionals and their clients, with the Pentair Home and Pro App smartphone applications making it easy to control, for example, the new IntelliFlo3 VSF pump (the first smart, connected VS pump).

Pentair stand

In this way, Pentair is renewing its commitment to supply professionals and their customers with equipment capable of contributing to the renovation or creation of pools with high added value, anticipating market expectations.
